General.Name: Ho Tung Chemical Corp
General.Description: Ho Tung Chemical Corp., together with its subsidiaries, develops, manufactures, markets, exports, and sells various chemical products in Taiwan, China, the Southeast Asia, and internationally. The company offers normal paraffins, a petrochemical intermediate raw material; linear alkylbenzene-Lab; linear alkylbenzene sulfonic acid-Las; alcohol ether sulfonate; and cationic surfactants, such as palmityl tri-methyl ammonium chloride and stearyl tri-methyl ammonium chloride. It also provides non-ionic surfactants comprising fatty alcohols, fatty alcohol ethoxylates, and coconut diethanol amide; cocamidopropyl betaine and dodecyl dimethyl betaine; and de-aromatic solvents. In addition, the company engages in the manufacture and sale of cement and cement raw materials, PMMA light guide plates, and various commodities; development of new energy and surfactant; and general investment activities. Ho Tung Chemical Corp. was incorporated in 1980 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 6, Zhongxing Rd., New Taipei City, Taiwan, 248
